p: Overall the session kept the students engaged and, although the scenario was a bit of fun, it happened to take place when a measles epidemic was causing the deaths of many children in Samoa. By discussing the Samoan outbreak and other epidemics (e.g. Ebola, SARS and now Coronavirus) the students clearly understood the seriousness of such situations and we hope they saw the need for a diverse team from a range of disciplines, using a variety of techniques, to best meet these challenges.
